good.name: Skimmed Milk
good.reason: An excellent source of high-quality protein and calcium, supporting muscle growth and bone health.

good.name: Milk Solids
good.reason: Provides concentrated dairy protein, which is essential for muscle repair and recovery.

good.name: Cocoa Powder
good.reason: Contains natural antioxidants called flavonoids that can support heart health and reduce inflammation.

okay.name: Water
okay.reason: A neutral base used for hydration and consistency.

okay.name: Nature Identical Flavouring
okay.reason: Provides flavor without the high sugar content of natural syrups, though it is synthetically produced.

okay.name: Edible Common Salt
okay.reason: Used in small amounts to enhance flavor; sodium intake should be monitored but is typically low in such drinks.

okay.name: Acidity Regulators (INS 340, 452, 339)
okay.reason: Mineral salts used to maintain the drink's texture and stability; generally recognized as safe in moderate amounts.

bad.name: Sucralose (INS 955)
bad.reason: An artificial sweetener that allows for zero sugar, but some studies suggest it may negatively impact gut health or insulin response.

bad.name: Carrageenan (INS 407)
bad.reason: A seaweed-derived thickener that has been linked to digestive inflammation and discomfort in sensitive individuals.

good.name: Skimmed Milk
good.reason: A high-quality source of complete protein and calcium with zero fat.

good.name: Milk Solids
good.reason: Concentrated dairy proteins that help achieve the high 25g protein content for muscle recovery.

good.name: Cocoa Powder
good.reason: Provides natural flavor and contains polyphenols which have antioxidant properties.

okay.name: Water
okay.reason: Used as a base for the beverage's consistency.

okay.name: Nature Identical Flavouring Substances
okay.reason: Standard additives used to enhance the chocolate taste; generally recognized as safe.

okay.name: Sucralose (INS 955)
okay.reason: A zero-calorie artificial sweetener that enables the 'no added sugar' claim, though some consumers prefer to avoid synthetic sweeteners.

okay.name: Acidity Regulators (INS 339, 340, 452)
okay.reason: Phosphate salts used to maintain stability and pH; safe in moderation but best limited in high-phosphate diets.

okay.name: Edible Common Salt
okay.reason: Enhances flavor and provides a small amount of electrolytes.

bad.name: Carrageenan (INS 407)
bad.reason: A common stabilizer that is controversial due to potential links to digestive distress and gut inflammation in sensitive individuals.

good.name: KSM-66 Ashwagandha Root Extract
good.reason: A high-quality, clinically studied adaptogen that helps reduce stress, improve cognitive function, and enhance muscle endurance.

okay.name: HPMC Capsule Shell
okay.reason: A standard vegetarian capsule material (Hypromellose) that is generally recognized as safe and inert.
